channel.title: Garysmod pic
channel.description:
[img]https://img132.imageshack.us/img132/3921/c1a00000.jpg[/img]
I made it for the black mesa mod, also I know this is from garysmod.org also how does it look?

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: Suggestive
item.description:
To be honest: your first picture was by far your best, despite the awkward pose that the ‘victim’ is in (as someone already mentioned: he would most likely not have fallen in such a position). You could have done a better job with zombie guy as well. Made him a bit more menacing, you know? The lighting is alright though.

I’m not even going to bother with the second, haha.

Third picture has them awkward poses again and it just doesn’t feel as atmospheric as you may have wanted. You might want to work on your faceposing as well - since the guy on the right looks like he’s actually having a good time (unless that’s what you were aiming for). It just seems a bit bland.

So yeah - I prefered the first one to be honest

Edit: Haha, Level pretty much ninja’d me

Read full topic

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
coldroll:

Here’s a new picture I made on a black mesa map, it’s also more serious.

Like I said before, stop posing read bodies. When someone is dead, they turn into a ragdoll, and if you try to post them in a dead position, they look awkward.
The guy on the right, if you wanted him sitting up, make him slouch down a bit more then lean him against the wall, and only lock the waist or head. If you lock to many parts (like you did), it looks weird and unnatural.

Read full topic

It’s an okay remake but it’s not the best.

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Actually it looks worse than the HL: S lobby IMO.
I figured by now someone would have remade the lobby in decent quality (aside from the BM devs of course)

Read full topic

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

Not saying the picture is good or anything, it’s rather ‘meh’ in my book.

But you said it was in Half-Life: Source, it’s not in HL: S, and in fact, the only HL2 model i see is the G-Man and maybe the chair. You’re failing at logic and then pretending he’s the one who’s confused.

I’m thinking you mean the quality of the remade HL1 lobby map is sub-par compared to the rest.

Well. Originally I thought it was HL: S because that is the GoldSrc lobby for sure. It being a direct remake in HL2DM has no significance whatsoever, it’s still a 1:1 remake of the HL1 lobby, thus detracting from the rest of the image.

There’s also still way too much blood going on in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
what he means is that the map seems rather undetailed compared to the models and props being used.
because the map is a remake of the old half life source map it is undetailed.

Read full topic

But you said it was in Half-Life: Source, it’s not in HL: S, and in fact, the only HL2 model i see is the G-Man and maybe the chair. You’re failing at logic and then pretending he’s the one who’s confused.

I’m thinking you mean the quality of the remade HL1 lobby map is sub-par compared to the rest.

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
That’s actually quite morbid. I like the idea, but the copious amounts of blood and the fact that it’s in HL:S detract from it all. The notion of Gman calmly surveying the destruction is a chilling one, though.

item.title: Garysmod pic
item.dc:creator: HeadCrabeD
item.description:
Level:

Doesn’t look like he fell very naturally. If he were dead or unconscious, that arm in the front would definitely roll into a different position.

It looks okay, but it’s not a very exciting screenshot.

Natrual enough for a Ragdoll
